name: The Outlaw Lefty Wright in Solar Dusk
name_original: The Outlaw Lefty Wright in Solar Dusk
description:
The Outlaw Lefty Wright in Solar Dusk is a 2.5D adventure that is in development. It needs some work yet, but it is a good start to a great adventure. Development started at TOJam 11!

Press Escape at any point to quit.

Programming, some art and SFX by Terry Katsoulis

Select art assets by Tamarin Studios Western Starter Pack via Unity Asset Store

Music by Matt Beckett

3D art/texturing by Indigo Doyle
